feels.name: Joy
feels.quote: He is going to unexplored regions, to 'the land of mist and snow,' with the joy a child feels when he embarks in a little boat.

causedByEvent.name: Embarking on a voyage to the North Pole

feels.name: Trust
feels.quote: He trusted the stranger to reveal his tale and was grateful for the offered communication.

causedByEvent.name: Stranger's promise to reveal his narrative

feels.name: Admiration
feels.quote: He feels exquisite pleasure in dwelling on the recollections of childhood and the virtues of his parents.

feels.name: Interest
feels.quote: He feels a desire to learn the secrets of heaven and earth and is eager to investigate the causes of things.

feels.name: Love
feels.quote: Everyone loved Elizabeth, and the attachment with which all regarded her became Robert's pride and delight.

feels.name: Sympathy
feels.quote: Her sympathy was a blessing to all and her presence was a living spirit of love.

feels.name: Adventurousness
feels.quote: He loved enterprise, hardship, and danger for its own sake and was deeply read in books of chivalry and romance.

feels.name: Generosity
feels.quote: He was thoughtful in his generosity and full of kindness and tenderness amidst his passion for adventurous exploits.
